INSERT INTO auth_authorization.CAS_COMPANY ( ID, COMPANY_CODE, COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_NAME, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTRY, ADDRESS, PHONE, PROXY_COMPANY_ID, INDUSTRY, LEGAL_PERSON, TAOBAO_ACCOUNT, UNION_ACCOUNT, AUTH_PROCESS_ID, AUTH_STATUS, SETTLED_PROCESS_ID, SETTLED_STATUS, IS_FOREVER_VALID, CLOSE_DATE, IS_FROZEN, UNFROZEN_TIME, IS_ACCESS_CONTROL, ID_CARD_POSITIVE_URL, ID_CARD_NEGATIVE_URL, BUSI_LICENSE_URL, TAX_REGISTRATION_URL, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proxyCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taobaoAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authProcessId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{authStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settledProcessId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{settledStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isForeverValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{closeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isFrozen,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{unfrozenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isAccessControl,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{idCardPositiveUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardNegativeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiLicenseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRegistrationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_auth_authorization.CAS_COMPANY.nextval as id FROM dual
